a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Reduction in income inequality before and after tax among total vs.
Percentage reduction in the Gini coefficient of income when measured after taxes and benefits, as compared to before
taxes and benefits. The reduction is among total population in the horizontal axis and among working population on the
Reduction in Gini for total population
Reduction in Gini for working population
